name: Union Européenne du Commerce du Bétail et des Métiers de la Viande
membership: European Liaison Committee for the Agricultural and Agri-Food Trade (CELCAA)
goal:
The UECBV pursues the following objectives:
- to represent and to defend livestock and meat trade, and livestock and meat industry;
- to promote Community trade and international trade;
- to deepen the internal market;
- to combat distortions of competition.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Trade and international market access
Sustainability - Environment - Climate change
Food information to consumers
Animal welfare/health
Public health/food safety/food authenticity
Functioning of the food chain
Image of meat
Research & Innovation
Customs legislation
Functioning of the single market
Meat Market Observatory
